name: Ame vs Bread
description:
Fight as Ame in her never-ending struggle against baked goods.

Features procedural generated dungeons, turn-based battles.

WUpALeftSDownDRightEOpen Menu(in office) / Ground Pound (in dungeon)

stat info box

This is my first game ever! I'm very excited to finally show it to the world.
